CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 28, 1961, page 14, reads: "Gridder Graduates - Francis Hill, son of Mr. and Mrs. Herman Hill of 1443 Oberlin St., was graduated from Schenley High School, following three years of varsity football as a guard. Hill will attend California State Teachers College, beginning in September. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Francis Hill wearing moustache, dark graduate cap and gown, light colored shirt, and dark necktie, holding Schenley High School diploma, standing on stage in front of dark curtains
